body:
Comment 13: 
i certainly didn't say "window's user don't need msi installer" or
"even don't need integration gotour.exe tool",
and just FYI, i suggested including gotour in the binary distribution.

Another reason for not including cross compiler is that cross compilation
doesn't support cgo (yet), and although not using cgo is not a big problem
on windows, it is a big problem on linux and other unix where the net
package requires cgo to resolve hostnames with libc resolver, not to mention
that os/user doesn't work without cgo.
